messages.msgSnippet: Always saying no is bad. NEVER saying no is just as bad. ___________________________________ I am sorry as if it seems that I was not requesting him to get
messages.messageBody:
Always saying no is bad.
NEVER saying no is just as bad.

___________________________________

I am sorry as if it seems that I was not requesting him to get off, get him to come down. He was just refusing, climbing higher. I have MS and I am not as fast as he is. I was doing my best in a difficult situation. I do like you idea of offering other places to climb. I have done that in the past and do take him to playgrounds and parks were there are more appropriate places to climb. Joanne

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
